Name: Kemomi-chan's Journey ~Enlightened Girl and the Innocent Doll~
About the game: A bullet hell sword-fighting 2D action game! An amnesiac girl with animal ears sets off on a journey in search of her father. She uses a sword technique called 'Iai' to stop time and take out enemies while time is stopped.
